sections.heading: care endorsement.An assisted-living facility which is an Alzheimer’s special care unit may apply for a memory care endorsement as provided in the Health Care Facility Licensure Act but shall not advertise itself as an endorsed memory care unit without such endorsement

sections.text:
71-517.Memory care endorsement.

An assisted-living facility which is an Alzheimer’s special care unit may apply for a memory care endorsement as provided in the Health Care Facility Licensure Act but shall not advertise itself as an endorsed memory care unit without such endorsement.

SourceLaws 2016, LB698, § 27.

Cross ReferencesHealth Care Facility Licensure Act, see section 71-401.
